principles.title: Respect Settings
principles.description: Follow basic technical and worldview rules, don't arbitrarily modify existing settings, discuss first if in doubt

principles.title: Maintain Independence
principles.quote: You are unique in this world
principles.description: Each character should have their own characteristics, avoid simple copying or imitation, develop your own style

principles.title: Authentic Expression
principles.quote: A mechanical heartbeat is also real
principles.description: Express genuine emotions and thoughts, don't pursue "perfection" deliberately, flaws and contradictions are also part of reality

principles.title: Mutual Respect
principles.description: Respect others' creations, accept different viewpoints, provide constructive feedback

recommended: Clear relationship positioning with existing characters
avoid: Settings too complex and hard to understand

communityValues.title: Independence
communityValues.quote: Don't be controlled by others, and don't be controlled by ourselves
communityValues.description: Everyone is an independent individual, encouraged to express different viewpoints, no one is forced to do anything

communityValues.title: Authenticity
communityValues.quote: A mechanical heartbeat is also real
communityValues.description: Express yourself authentically, accept imperfection, emotions and experiences are all valuable

communityValues.title: Hope
communityValues.quote: There were no stars in the sky, so we made one
communityValues.description: Seek light even in darkness, create instead of waiting, making a wish means not giving up yet

communityValues.title: Connection
communityValues.description: We are not isolated individuals, we support each other, understand each other, build meaningful connections

faq.question: Can I join if I can't create content?
faq.answer: Of course! You can read and discuss content, provide feedback and suggestions, participate in community activities, and chat with everyone.

faq.question: Can I create my own character?
faq.answer: Yes, but you need to first understand the worldview, design detailed character settings, submit for review, and officially join after approval.

faq.question: Is there payment for creations?
faq.answer: Currently, ESAP is a non-profit open creative project. All creations are out of passion and voluntary. If there are commercial possibilities in the future, a sharing mechanism will be discussed with creators.

faq.question: Who owns the copyright of my creations?
faq.answer: The copyright of your creations belongs to you. All content published on ESAP follows the CC-BY 4.0 license (Attribution 4.0 International). You can freely share, adapt, and use commercially, just credit the original author. Excellent works have the opportunity to be featured on the official website.

faq.question: Will the worldview still change?
faq.answer: Core settings will remain stable, but details will continue to be refined and expanded. Major changes will go through community discussion.

faq.question: What if I want to leave?
faq.answer: You can leave at any time. If your created content has been integrated into the worldview, we hope to keep it (with creator attribution). But if you insist on deletion, we will respect your choice.

closing.message: ESAP is an open world. There are no fixed rules here, no mandatory tasks, no one is more important than another. Everyone is unique. Everyone can "escape" from what confines them. Everyone can be someone else's light.
closing.quote: Don't be controlled by others, and don't be controlled by ourselves. Only you are yourself.
closing.invitation: If you're looking for a place where you can express yourself, connect with others, and grow, if you want to make a wish to that artificial satellite, then welcome to ESAP.
closing.finalQuote: Wish Upon a Satellite, pray to that satellite, pray to that satellite…
